item.title: Tim Robinson’s HBO Series ‘The Chair Company’ Gets Release Date, First-Look Images
item.description: Tim Robinson’s new comedy series “The Chair Company” will premiere on HBO and HBO Max on Oct. 12. Co-created by Robinson and his “I Think You Should Leave” collaborator Z
